Hands-on Python Tutorial Release 2.0

This document provides a hands-on tutorial for learning Python, covering topics such as context, the Python interpreter and Idle, types and functions, integer arithmetic, strings, variables and assignment, print function, input and output, defining functions of your own, dictionaries, and loops.

Key Concepts:

  • Context of Python programming
  • Introduction to Python interpreter and Idle
  • Types and functions in Python
  • Integer arithmetic in Python
  • Strings in Python
  • Variables and assignment in Python
  • Print function in Python
  • Input and output in Python
  • Defining functions in Python
  • Dictionaries in Python
